DOC.brief_summary: This epidemiological non-interventional study assess prevalence anxiety and/or depression disorder patient suffer Psoriatic Arthritis ( PsA ) Spain .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Anxiety Depression Patients With Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients gender 18 year old Patients PsA diagnosis Exclusion criterion : Patients PsA suffer rheumatologic disease nonconcomitant rheumatologic disease investigator considers appropriate study . Patients medical physical condition ( cognitive damage difficulty understand ) create difficulty read complete questionnaire describe protocol . Patients study period take part another clinical trial .
